players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie was killed last night, which means we need to be very careful with our votes today to avoid losing another innocent player."
Diana: "Bob's actions last night are suspicious, and we should consider investigating him to determine his role."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. We need to vote her out to protect the town."
Bob: "Alice is lying to cover herself. Trust me, I’m the detective and I confirmed her role last night. We must vote Alice out now before she kills again."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso, Bob is trying to frame me because he wants to hide his own role. If Bob is the detective, why didn't he share any useful information before accusing me directly?"
Diana: "I think Bob is the mafioso because his story doesn't add up and he's trying to deflect attention from himself. We should vote him out today."
